pages.text: $(#551012)$(bold)Sanity$()$(#551012) is a precious resource in TREPIDATION. A $(#FFFF55)brain icon$(#551012) will appear at the bottom left of your screen when your sanity changes.$(br2)A low sanity will cause you to $(#FFFF55)hallucinate$(#551012) and $(#FFFF55)warp your view$(#551012), so keep it high!

$(#551012)You will know when your sanity is affected when you see these messages:$(br)§4§oYour grip on reality §4§oweakens...$(br)§3§oYour grip on reality §3§ostrengthens...$(br2)$(#551012)There are a few ways to increase your sanity, which you will discover throughout your journey. Keep an eye out for what $(#FFFF55)certain events$(#551012) and $(#FFFF55)items$(#551012) trigger those messages.
